item.title: Emma Sameth,Jeremy Zucker,Wolfe - Spin With You
item.description:
작곡: Jeremy Zu.., Emma Sameth / 작사: Words & Music by
KY: 94806

Got a lot
on my mind
You got a lot
on yours
But we can run
like the wind baby
Go lock
the door
You know
we lose it
Sometimes
in love and war
But we roll
like a river
We’ll reach
the shore
Sink slowly
just hold me
I just wanna spin
around in circles
I’ll fall
on the ground
With you
duh duh duh duh
With you
duh duh duh duh
Down and drunk
and dizzy for it
Come on I’ll fall
on the ground
With you
duh duh duh duh
With you
duh duh duh duh
I just wanna spin
around in circles
I’ll fall
on the ground
Yeah
yeah
I got a lot
on my mind
You got a lot
on yours
But you sound
like a love song baby
Four on the floor
I know that
Sometimes we fight
sometimes ignore
But we could
pull it together
See
what’s in store
Sink slowly
just hold me
I just wanna spin
around in circles
I’ll fall
on the ground
With you
duh duh duh duh
With you
duh duh duh duh
Down and drunk
and dizzy for ya
Come on I’ll fall
on the ground
With you
duh duh duh duh
With you
duh duh duh duh
I just wanna spin
around in circles
I’ll fall
on the ground

In bed
with the bottle open
Give me that sweet
shot of lovin’
No I don’t know
where we’re going
But I wanna be alone
with you
In bed
with the bottle open
Give me that sweet
shot of lovin’
No I don’t know
where we’re going
But
I wanna be alone
With you
duh duh duh duh
With you

and dizzy for ya

on the ground
With you

With you

around in circles
I’ll fall
on the ground
With you

With you
duh duh duh duh
Down and drunk
and dizzy for ya
Come on I’ll fall
on the ground
With you
duh duh duh duh
With you
duh duh duh duh
I just wanna spin
around in circles
I’ll fall
on the ground
I gotta be with you
I gotta be with you
Oh oh oh
oh yeah yeah
I gotta be with you

with you
